text: Hey all. We are looking for help setting up an API integration to populate custom objects bidirectionally with HubDB. This is outside of our skill set. Looking to contract with a developer to get this set up. DM me if this is something you can help with. Looking for timeline, rates and what you would need from me to get this going.
Hey Jon, curios to hear more about why you want to accomplish this? Is it so you can have the valuable publishing benefits of HubDB, but platform features of custom objects for your data source?
Rather than having to sync the data, would you prefer to just be able to have the data in a single place?
